casebody.data:
CITY OF NEW HAVEN v. LOCAL 884, COUNCIL 4, AFSCME, AFL-CIO J. William Gagne, Jr., in support of the petition. Audrey C. Kramer, assistant corporation counsel, in opposition. Decided October 12, 2000

NORCOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
